message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $12,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I think $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is already a very competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
